<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ModalState 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [isOpen](./react.modalstate.isopen.md) |  | boolean | Whether the modal is open or not |

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [hide()](./react.modalstate.hide.md) | A callback to hide the modal |
